tool_description: Candlestick chart of coins based on Binance data
name: Crypto Chart
title: Crypto Chart

api_list.name: Get chart data
api_list.description: Get candlestick data of a coin based on Binance data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-chart1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/get_chart"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-chart1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-chart1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/get_chart"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-chart1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
